algorithm_technique: Iterate through text, track broken words using a set for broken letters.
problem_summary_simple: Count words in a text that can be typed with a keyboard missing some letters.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through text, using a set for broken letters to identify and count typeable words.
key_insights: Using a set for brokenLetters provides O(1) average time complexity for lookups.
A boolean flag efficiently tracks if the current word is broken.
The solution processes the text character by character, making it linear.
Edge cases like the last word are handled by checking the flag after the loop.
